name: ExposureKit
summary: Library for iOS Camera API, common photography operations just like a normal camera.
description:
ExposureKit helps you add camera to your app quickly with functions just like a regular camera.

- built-in filter support
- capture RAW format with custom photo quality for non-RAW images
- auto focus, distance (zone) focus and point focus
- exposure compensation
- easy output orientation handling
- flash toggle
